EmailTemplate.name: Street Closures Submitted Application Fee
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Submitting a Request with SFMTA: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your application with SFMTA. We will be reviewing your application to make sure you have all necessary documents attached. Please log back in to make a payment using this link and click the Make Payment button: {!Case.Link}
You have submitted your application {!Case.Lead_Time_in_Days__c} days before the date of your requested closure. Your fee for this application therefore is {!Case.Net_Due__c}. Once you have made a payment, SFMTA will begin processing your application.
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
